404.title: Page Not Found
404.message: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.
404.description: The URL might be misspelled or the page has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.message: Sorry, an error occurred on our server.
500.description: Our team has been notified and is working on the issue.

403.title: Access Denied
403.message: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page.
403.description: Please contact the administrator if you believe this is a mistake.

419.title: Page Expired
419.message: Your session has expired due to inactivity.
419.description: Please refresh the page or log in again to continue.
419.concurrent: Your account has been detected logging in from another device or browser. This session has been automatically terminated for your security.
419.timeout: Your session has expired due to inactivity for a significant amount of time.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You have made too many requests in a short period.
429.description: Please check back in a moment or contact administrator if you believe this is a mistake.
